title: Myth, busted: Formation of Namibia’s fairy circles isn’t due to termites
description: Plants are "ecosystem engineers" that survive by forming optimal geometric patterns.

description: No replacement has been named yet.

description: Road-tripping in a Ford F-150 Lightning Platinum and Mustang Mach-E GT.

title: Man says he secretly lowered his town’s water fluoride for over a decade

description: Europe seems to be ready for the winter as renewable growth largely offsets coal.

title: Car feature subscriptions should be illegal, New Jersey legislators say

title: How Vice Society got away with a global ransomware spree
description: Vice Society has a superpower that’s allowed it to quietly thrive: Mediocrity.
